user.title: Setup HA Fleet Agent
user.description:
Connect this Home Assistant instance to your HA Fleet Management backend.

You'll need:
- Backend URL (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:8100)
- API Token from your Fleet dashboard

The agent will send system metrics every 5 minutes.

data_description.cloud_url: URL of your HA Fleet backend server
data_description.api_key: Authentication token from Fleet Management dashboard
data_description.instance_name: Friendly name for this instance (defaults to Home Assistant location name)

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to backend. Check URL and network connectivity.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API token. Generate a new one from the backend dashboard.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check logs for details.
error.timeout: Connection timeout. Is the backend running and reachable?

abort.already_configured: This Home Assistant instance is already configured with HA Fleet Agent.
